AboutContent: Iâ€™m a pre-final undergraduate student at BITS Pilani pursuing dual major in Computer Science and Chemistry.
If you ever see me lost in my thoughts, I am probably thinking about how can technology be applied to solve our everyday problems.
I am passionate about Machine Learning and Computer Vision. I like to think about their different applications and try to experiement with it. I also love football, dancing and community services :)
As much as I love to work and hustle, I also like to travel and indulge into adventures!
WorkContent: I am currently open to work in the field of Machine Learning and Deep Learning. Interdisciplinary research in the field of Chemistry and Computer Science is what excites me
ProjectsStartLine: I believe that doing projects is one of the best ways to learn. Some of the projects I did can be found here :

CVStartLine: I am always looking for opportunities to do innovating and impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
